channel.title: When i try to loggin i get an error connecting to server
channel.description: i really need help if any one can help add me on skype: kevin334400 btw noting to do with the ip i think it mite be varables

item.title: When i try to loggin i get an error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @kethscape kethscape
item.description:
@kethscape wrote:

i did that i no how to simple code it just keeps giving me this error

pray4urlife:

Ok well then the ip must not be set to localhost so open your client and search for client.java and then hit ctrl f again and look for “server =” then change that ip to 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 compile done.

Read full topic
item.source: When i try to loggin i get an error connecting to server

item.title: When i try to loggin i get an error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @aquatizscape aquatizscape
item.description:
@aquatizscape wrote:

To have a working server, and make it be online, you have to have your router portforwarded. It opens the pot so people can connect to your router and play. Visit a few guides online about your router’s portforwarding[quote=“kethscape, post:3, topic:442243”]im not trying to get it online atm it says it for
117
every client and source i run and my router cant be portfoward[/quote]

Read full topic
